title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Patrick Reilly
raw_text: Skip to content Issue 24 – September 2008 Cover Art Into the Depths Patrick been working as an illustrator since he was 15. He has illustrated and designed merchandise (t-shirts, ads, brochures, packaging) for Disney, Universal, and Warner Brothers. He recently started working as an artist with Radical Comics. Skip to content
Issue 24 – September 2008
Cover Art
Into the Depths
Patrick been working as an illustrator since he was 15. He has illustrated and designed merchandise (t-shirts, ads, brochures, packaging) for Disney, Universal, and Warner Brothers. He recently started working as an artist with Radical Comics.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
